hexagrams.judgment: The Creative works sublime success, furthering through perseverance.
hexagrams.image: The movement of heaven is full of power. Thus the superior person makes themselves strong and untiring.

lines.2: Dragon appearing in the field. It furthers one to see the great person.
lines.3: All day long the superior person is creatively active. At nightfall their mind is still beset with cares. Danger. No blame.
lines.4: Wavering flight over the depths. No blame.
lines.5: Flying dragon in the heavens. It furthers one to see the great person.
lines.6: Arrogant dragon will have cause to repent.

hexagrams.meaning: Pure creative energy. The time for initiative, power, and persistent effort. Like the dragon rising through the clouds, this hexagram represents the full expression of yang energy.

hexagrams.judgment: The Receptive brings about sublime success, furthering through the perseverance of a mare. When the superior person has somewhere to go, they may be confused at first but later finds guidance.
hexagrams.image: The earth's condition is receptive devotion. Thus the superior person who has breadth of character carries the outer world.

lines.1: When there is hoarfrost underfoot, solid ice is not far off.
lines.2: Straight, square, great. Without purpose, yet nothing remains unfurthered.
lines.3: Hidden lines. One is able to remain persevering.
lines.4: A tied-up sack. No blame, no praise.
lines.5: A yellow lower garment brings supreme good fortune.
lines.6: Dragons fight in the meadow. Their blood is black and yellow.

hexagrams.meaning: Pure receptive energy. The time for devotion, support, and nourishment. Like the earth that supports all things, this hexagram represents the full expression of yin energy.
